HenshinLtkEmfRefactoringProcessorAdapter
public class LtkEmfRefactoringProcessorAdapter
extends org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring.participants.RefactoringProcessor

Adapter class of a LTK RefactoringProcessor used for EMF model refactorings.

Author:
Florian Mantz

public boolean checkConditions()
Checks the initial and final conditions of the refactoring.
